name: betterfetch
desc: a powerful fetch script for systems that support sh
install: cd ~ && git clone https://github.com/sctech-tr/betterfetch.git && cd betterfetch && sudo make install
remove: cd ~ && git clone https://github.com/sctech-tr/betterfetch.git && cd betterfetch && sudo make uninstall
update: cd ~ && rm -rf betterfetch && git clone https://github.com/sctech-tr/betterfetch.git && cd betterfetch && sudo make install

name: kanban

install: cd ~ && git clone https://github.com/sctech-tr/kanban.git sctech-kanban && cd kanban && npm install && echo run it with node server.js in ~/sctech-kanban/

name: lockedimg
desc: secure image locker in C that encrypts your images with a password and requires a password to decrypt them
install: cd ~ && wget https://github.com/sctech-tr/lockedimg/releases/download/1.0/lockedimg.zip && unzip lockedimg.zip && cd lockedimg && sudo mv lockedimg /usr/bin
update: cd ~ && rm lockedimg.zip && rm -rf lockedimg && wget https://github.com/sctech-tr/lockedimg/releases/download/1.0/lockedimg.zip && unzip lockedimg.zip && cd lockedimg && sudo mv lockedimg /usr/bin
